title: Ipa kuOrbital Temple
heading: Pedzisa Mupiro Wako
chooseHow: Sarudza maitiro aungade kupedzisa mutero wako unobviswa mutero:

option1.heading: Sarudzo 1: Donate Online Ikozvino
option1.description: Pedzisa chipo chako nekukurumidza uchishandisa kadhi rechikwereti, kadhi rechikwereti, kana dzimwe nzira dzekubhadhara dzepamhepo kuburikidza neanochengetedza mari anotsigira, Munda . Uchagamuchira risiti yemutero chiriporipo.

option2.heading: Sarudzo 2: Bank Deposit kuThe Roy Foundation
option2.description: Ita dhipoziti yakananga kubhangi kana waya kuThe Roy Foundation , shamwari yedu yehungwaru uye mubatsiri wemari. Iyi sarudzo yakanaka kune mipiro yakakura kana kutamiswa kune dzimwe nyika.
option2.instructions: Ndokumbira uise " Orbital Tembere - {donationType} " mundima yereferensi. Mushure mekupedza kutumira kwako, titumire email pa sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art neruzivo rwako rwekutamisa kuti ugamuchire risiti yako yemutero.

taxInfo.heading: Mutero-Deductible Kupa
taxInfo.description: Orbital Tembere ipurojekiti inotsigirwa nemari yeThe Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , iyo 501 (c) (3) isiri purofiti sangano. Mipiro yese yeUS inobvisirwa mutero kusvika pamwero unobvumidzwa nemutemo.
